scripts.compile: pnpm update-version && pnpm clean && pnpm tspc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.compile:prod: pnpm update-version && pnpm clean && pnpm tspc -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.test:node: pnpm compile && pnpm aegir test -t node -f "dist/test/**/*.test.{js,cjs,mjs}" --cov -- --exit
scripts.test:browser: pnpm compile && pnpm aegir test -t browser -f "dist/test/**/*.test.{js,cjs,mjs}" --cov
scripts.test:electron-main: pnpm compile && pnpm aegir test -t electron-main -f "dist/test/**/*.test.{js,cjs,mjs}" --cov
scripts.test:electron-renderer: pnpm compile && pnpm aegir test -t electron-renderer -f "dist/test/**/*.test.{js,cjs,mjs}" --cov
scripts.format: pnpm prettier --ignore-path .gitignore --write "**/*.+(js|ts|json)" && pnpm eslint src test
scripts.release: pnpm test && pnpm compile:prod && (git commit -a -m 'version' || true) && pnpm publish
